DEVELOPMENT.TITLE: Development
DEVELOPMENT.DESCRIPTION: I can translate and implement website requirements based on your needs and suggestions, creating graphical interfaces from mockups.

MAINTENANCE.TITLE: Maintenance
MAINTENANCE.DESCRIPTION: I can maintain the project by improving its reliability thanks to many years of experience in bug resolution, but most importantly through the implementation of unit and e2e tests.

EFFICIENCY.TITLE: Efficiency
EFFICIENCY.DESCRIPTION: One of my key words is efficiency. The best thing for a website is to be efficient and scalable across all platforms. By implementing new Angular features and properly modularizing the project, I can achieve high performance standards.

CERTIFICATIONS.TITLE: Certifications
CERTIFICATIONS.NO_CERTIFICATION_MESSAGE: Currently in progress! Check back soon for updates.

PERSONAL_DESCRIPTION.SECTION1:
I have about six years of experience in web development. My professional career started in 2019 as a Junior Developer,
and after several years of dedication, I had the opportunity to be promoted to a Senior role.
PERSONAL_DESCRIPTION.SECTION2:
Most of my experience focuses on Angular, TypeScript, and RxJS.
I've recently delved into Angular versions 16 to 19, and I'm eager to put this new knowledge into practice.
Additionally, I've used React, Redux, and NgRx in various applications.
PERSONAL_DESCRIPTION.SECTION3:
My greatest satisfaction lies in creating fluid and efficient interfaces. I ensure my code is clean and reusable,
with a particular emphasis on performance and User Experience (UX).
My goal is for the products we create to be flawless and offer an enjoyable user experience.
PERSONAL_DESCRIPTION.SECTION4:
In my previous experiences, I've worked with Scrum and Agile methodologies.
I enjoy being part of an organization where team members discuss and share ideas, which is why, in my opinion,
code reviews are one of the best ways to improve both team skills and product quality,
helping others write higher-quality code and always learning something new myself.
I would be happy to join a team where I can grow professionally and contribute to your exciting project.

DESCRIPTION.TIMELINE_1: Implemented automated tests (unit tests and end-to-end tests) to ensure software reliability and quality using Cypress and Jasmine
DESCRIPTION.TIMELINE_3: Collaborated with designers and product managers to translate business requirements into effective technical functionalities
DESCRIPTION.TIMELINE_4: Designed and developed reusable and highly modular Angular 12 components, reducing development time and improving code maintainability
DESCRIPTION.TIMELINE_5: Collaborated with external backend teams to integrate APIs and RESTful services, ensuring data consistency and performance optimization
DESCRIPTION.TIMELINE_6: Collaborated with an international team in Scrum methodology for various overseas projects

DESCRIPTION.TIMELINE_1: Developed and maintained an internal project with web application components and modules using Angular 15 and TypeScript
DESCRIPTION.TIMELINE_2: Implemented state management solutions with NgRx to ensure efficient and reactive application state handling
DESCRIPTION.TIMELINE_3: Developed responsive and accessible user interfaces, following UX/UI design best practices
DESCRIPTION.TIMELINE_4: Created dynamic web applications using React 17 and Redux, improving interactivity and user experience
DESCRIPTION.TIMELINE_5: Collaborated with a backend team, maintaining the latter using SpringBoot
DESCRIPTION.TIMELINE_6: Developed and integrated i18n for multilingual applications to improve their accessibility

DESCRIPTION.TIMELINE_1: Oversaw the software development of a new startup to launch it into the market
DESCRIPTION.TIMELINE_2: Refactored WordPress site and managed SEO to generate more conversions and ensure efficiency and scalability
DESCRIPTION.TIMELINE_3: Integrated payment systems with Stripe, Klarna, and PayPal
DESCRIPTION.TIMELINE_4: Implemented Anti-DDoS plugin to ensure greater security
DESCRIPTION.TIMELINE_5: Optimized images and implemented caching system for faster rendering
